thread.title: Jay Alvarrez and Alexis Rene show off stunning round-the-world adventures in video
thread.title_full: Jay Alvarrez and Alexis Rene show off stunning round-the-world adventures in video | Daily Mail Online

author: Becky Pemberton For Mailonline
title: Jay Alvarrez and Alexis Rene show off stunning round-the-world adventures in video
text:
224 shares 14
View
comments
Forget being stuck at a tourist trap or eating dodgy holiday food, this impossibly-perfect couple is showing travellers how they should be spending their holidays.
Young Californian duo Jay Alvarrez and Alexis Rene have created a magical video that highlights their never-ending exploration of the world, and may look like a fairy tale to the average traveller.
In a tribute to his stunning girlfriend, photographer Jay dedicated the slow motion video to her, featuring clips of the model from their travels to some of the most beautiful locations on earth.

Young Californian duo Jay Alvarrez and Alexis Rene (pictured) have created a magical video covering their never-ending travels
In a tribute to his girlfriend, photographer Jay included clips of the model as they visited some of the world's most beautiful spots
Jay's videos feature the best moments from their travelling lifestyle, including swimming with sharks, surfing and snowboarding
The mesmerising video was uploaded to the Jay's YouTube channel where it has proved popular with viewers, having racked up more than a million views.
The clip, entitled 'Girl Of My Dreams', begins with Jay picking up a pillow and launching it at the tanned, slumbering model telling her to wake up and get out of bed.

Incredible pictures show Queen Mary 2 leaving New York in... Veil of secrecy over plans for Shanghai Disneyland is... As his bikini-clad girlfriend laughs, the duvet is pulled off, and their travel clips begin.
Looking like something out of an airbrushed advert, the model is filmed watching elaborate sunsets, walking across infinity pools, stroking sting rays and showering in waterfalls.
The incredible video was uploaded to the Jay's YouTube channel where it has racked up more than a million views
Looking like something out of an airbrushed advert the model is filmed watching elaborate sunsets and walking across infinity pools
Holding Jay's hand, the model runs through their luxurious apartment on holiday before launching into the pool in slow motion
Jay's video channel features their travelling lifestyle, including one of him jetsetting from LAX Airport, driving a Ferrari, adopting a puppy with his girlfriend and surfing and snowboarding.
Clearly a thrillseeker, the photographer can also be seen parachuting from helicopters and hot air balloons.
The tribute video ends with Alexis walking off into the sunset, as another incredible day in their worldwide adventure draws to a close.
Close-up shots alternate with walking through paradise, and an underwater camera captures Alexis swimming in the sea
The model wanders into a lagoon, closely followed by her infatuated photographer boyfriend
The video showcases some of the most spectacular views around the world, including their trip to Thailand
Adventurer Jay is also the subject of photos when he is taking part in extreme sports such as parachuting
The video shows the pair relaxing on the beach or taking part in a number of exhilarating activities on their travels
The tribute video ends with Alexis walking off into the sunset, as another incredible day in their worldwide adventures draws to a close
The pair display their vibrant travelling images on Jay's tumblr blog as well as on Instagram, where Jay has 1.9million followers and Alexis an impressive 2.5million.
Their travels take them across the globe, from their California base to Thailand, Hawaii and Indonesia.
Their recent adventures can be seen soaking up sun in Greece, looking completely carefree.
Jay Alvarrez and Alexis Rene share their amazing travel snaps on their Instagram pages and Jay's tumblr page
The holiday snaps are guaranteed to trump yours, thanks to the model-like subjects and great photography
The beautiful pair love nothing more than snapping amazing photos together enjoying the sunshine around the world
The pair appear to spend most of their time in swimwear enjoying the sun, sea and sand lifestyle they lead
The couple appear very much in love in their picture-perfect snaps as they play up to the camera to create fun-loving shots in Greece
Jay loves nothing more than making his model girlfriend the subject of his snaps which he posts on his Tumblr account
The couple recently went to Santorini for what looked liked an incredible holiday in the sun
On the road: The couple travel around the stunning Greek coastline on their unending travel adventures
